Welcome, |PLAYERNAME|! You look a little stressed today. If you like to view my offers of potions, just ask me for a {trade}. In case you're looking for the marketplace and dungeons, just follow the path to the east!
I can offer you homemade {antidote} potions and small {health} potions. Ask me for a {trade} if you like to see them.
Antidote potions will cure {poisoning}. They also have a lovely {blueberry} taste. You only need them when you get poisoned deep down in a dungeon, else just go to the {temple} for a free heal!
Health potions will heal you for about 75 hit points. It can't hurt to carry one with you just in case.
Oh, do you have blueberries for sale? I need them for my {antidote} {potion}. I give you 1 gold for 5 of them, yes?
The temple is just to the right. You can get a healing for free there if you are badly injured or poisoned.
I can offer you homemade {antidote} potions and small {health} potions. Ask me for a {trade} if you like to see them.
He sells {weapons}. His shop is east of here.
If you are looking for weapons, you should visit {Obi}'s shop east of here. Or, if you have a {premium} account, go to {Lee'Delle} for better offers.
If you are a {premium} adventurer, you should check out {Lee'Delle's} shop. She lives in the western part of town, just across the bridge.

He's the local tanner. You could try selling fresh corpses or leather to him.
Yum, cookies! If you have some for me, just ask me for a {trade}.
I will pay you 5 gold for every empty vial and potion flask. Just ask me for a {trade}.

Oh, I'm sorry. I'm not buying less than 5 blueberries.
Visiting Cipfried in the {temple} is a good idea if you are injured or poisoned. He can heal you.
I don't know what to think about all this new party stuff. {Rookgaard} needs a little peace!
Hyacinth also sells small health potions. He lives outside the village, in a hidden place.
She's {Obi}'s granddaughter and deals with {armors} and {shields}, just upstairs from Obi's shop.
He's a farmer and sells {food}. Food will help you regain health when you are injured. Many {monsters} also carry food with them.
Sadly, our little village of {Rookgaard} is invaded by monsters. From the {dungeons} they creep to the surface and attack the city. We always need adventurers helping us to {fight} them.
Well, in this village and its surroundings you can {train} your skills until you are level 8. Then you should see the {oracle} and head to the {main} continent.
If you need information about the dungeons here, you should talk to one of the bridge {guards}. They will show you where to go.
To train your skills, simply help us {fighting} monsters.
You can find the oracle on the top floor of the {academy}, just above {Seymour}. Go there when you are level 8 to reach more areas of {Tibia}.
The main continent is huge! The gods of Tibia created everything from great seas, deep jungles and large deserts.
Our bridge guards are {Dallheim} and {Zerbrus}. You can find Dallheim if you follow the path to the right, then turn north at the {temple}.
If you want to fight monsters, you should get better {equipment} from the {merchants}. You should also talk to one of the bridge {guards} to find suitable monsters for you.
Seymour is a teacher running the {academy}. He has many important {information} about Tibia.
Tibia is our beautiful world, created by the gods. Being a {druid}, I'm a worshipper of {Crunor}.
He is a great warrior. He can also tell you much about {monsters} and {dungeons} on this island.
He is a great warrior. He can also tell you much about {monsters} and {dungeons} on this island.
You definitely need a good {weapon}, an {armor} and a {shield}. Also, you should never leave for a {dungeon} without {rope}, {shovel} and {torch}.
To view the offers of a merchant, simply talk to him or her and ask for a {trade}. They will gladly show you their offers and also the things they buy from you.
Our bridge guards are {Dallheim} and {Zerbrus}. You can find Dallheim if you follow the path to the right, then turn north at the {temple}.
How can I help you? If you like to buy something, just ask me for a {trade}. We can also chat about {Tibia}. Or, I could give you general {hints} about the game.
Being a druid is a wonderful profession. You control the forces of nature and can heal others.
Crunor is the great lord of trees and the creator of all plants. Despite what some people believe, he didn't create the {monsters}, though.
You best buy such equipment at {Al} {Dee}'s store in the North of the village. Or, if you have a {premium} account, go to {Lee'Delle} for better offers.
